1623362 THE INDIAN RAILWAY COMPANIES (REPEAL) ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 24 OF 2001 [ 29th August, 2001.]
An Act to repeal the Indian Railway Companies Act, 1895.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
219208 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Indian Railway Companies (Repeal) Act, 2001.
315268 2Repeal of Act 10 of 1895.- The Indian Railway Companies Act, 1895 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secy. to the Govt. of India.
